#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
void merge(char *,int, int , int );
void mergesort(char *a, int low, int high)
{
    int mid;
    if (low < high)
    {
        mid=(low+high)/2;
        mergesort(a,low,mid);
        mergesort(a,mid+1,high);
        merge(a,low,high,mid);
    }
    return;
}
void merge(char *a, int low, int high, int mid)
{
    int i, j, k;
    char c[20];
    i = low;
    k = low;
    j = mid + 1;
    while (i <= mid && j <= high)
    {
        if (a[i] < a[j])
        {
            c[k] = a[i];
            k++;
            i++;
        }
        else
        {
            c[k] = a[j];
            k++;
            j++;
        }
    }
    while (i <= mid)
    {
        c[k] = a[i];
        k++;
        i++;
    }
    while (j <= high)
    {
        c[k] = a[j];
        k++;
        j++;
    }
    for (i = low; i < k; i++)
    {
        a[i] = c[i];
    }
}




int main(){

    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
            char s1[1000];
            char s2[1000];
            cin>>s1>>s2;
            mergesort(s1, 0, strlen(s1)-1);
            mergesort(s2, 0, strlen(s2)-1);


            if(strcmp(s1, s2) == 0)
            {

                cout<<"YES\n";
            }
            else{
                cout<<"NO\n";
            }
    }


}
